column5: Hi all.  Long time browser.  I find this site has been very helpful to me.  Learned lots.  Laughed some.  I fish multi species.  Muskie, salmon,  whities, walleye and smallies.   My squeeze is a 17 ft Lund Tyee/115 Yami 4 str.  I'm out there twice weekly May -Oct.  I need some advice.  Looking to rent a cottage on the St Lawrence just west of Brockville end of July.  Anybody have any comments on the fishing there?
